    • compareLocalToBusinessHours

      public static boolean compareLocalToBusinessHours(LocalDateTime timeToCompare)
      Compares local time to the company's business hours, which is 8am to 10pm EST. Returns true if hours are between business hours. Returns false if hours are outside business hours.
      Parameters:
      timeToCompare -
      Returns:
      easternTimeToCompare
